E.g. \"app01\" results in keys like \"app01:foo\" and \"app01:bar\"."}]},{"type":"element","tag":"li","props":{},"children":[{"type":"element","tag":"code","props":{"className":[]},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"label"}]},{"type":"text","value":": Optional label for keys.
